author: potuz
content: <@!449019668296892420> for what it's worth, since you told me, I've only seen two bad head votes on my node (which is rather impressive), both where blocks produced by Nimbus without the fix presumably as they are EF nodes. Pyrmont looking good!

author: arnetheduck
content: that's good to hear! interesting that the blocks would get included in the chain but not voted on - they must have been right on the cusp (as opposed to being orphaned)

author: protolambda
content: Changing some machine/infra again, will take 5% of pyrmont offline. Also looks like Teku team is performing a non-rolling update, their validators are offline, another 20%. Pyrmont should be fine meanwhile

author: ajsutton
content: Yeah sorry, ours will be back soon.

author: protolambda
content: Our nodes too, but will do 3 more updates (5% each) later, if everything is ok (looks good so far)
